title: When there is a # sign in the password, the URL cannot be parsed normally if the password is configured in the URL
description:
Environment

  • Dubbo version: 3.1.1
  • Operating System version: xxx
  • Java version: xxx

Expected Behavior

        # can be supported when configuring password with URL

Actual Behavior

config demo:

 zookeeper://test:test#1223@10.301.216.302:2181

 This url is cant`t cannot be normally  parsed
